comments.text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10.6; rv:2.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10.6; rv:2.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0

the scrollbar goes crazy(flickering up/down) when I scroll with the macbook trackpad.

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1.search for an image on google
2.2 finger scroll
3.watch the scrollbar go crazy
Actual Results:  
the scrollbar flickers

Expected Results:  
the scroll should be smooth

no theme. only adblock

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:

comments.creator: matthewslaney@gmail.com
comments.raw_text: I'm having a similar problem. It's due to the focus being forced back to the search text and therefore it scrolls through the search suggestions instead of actually scrolling down the page, and this causes it to refresh the page to new, unrelated results. Are you having this same issue with it pulling the focus back to the search box?
comments.text: I'm having a similar problem.
